hints.info: will be used for account-related notifications and for password resets

hints.primaryDescription: This email will be used for account-related notifications and can also be used for password resets.
hints.verifiedDescription: This email may be used as login method and for receive notifications. If it's configured as primary email, it can be used for reset your password.
hints.unverifiedDescription: Unverified email addresses cannot be used to reset your password, as a login method, for receive notifications or set as primary email
hints.visibleEmailDescription: This email can be visible in profile emails.
hints.notVisibleEmailDescription: This email cannot be visible in profile emails.
